insert.selectKey: select count(1) from E_MOVE_IN where min_id = #{minId}
insert.if: insert into E_MOVE_IN ( min_id, pripid, minletnum, moutarea, minrea, moutareregorg, mindate, s_ext_fromnode, s_ext_datatime ) values ( #{minId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pripid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{minletnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moutarea, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{minrea, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moutareregorg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_date(#{mindate, jdbcType=DATE}, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), 440300, SYSDATE )
